snippet.title: Forestygian Gameplay Trailer #1
snippet.description:
The trailer shows how it is to play Forestygian, indie roguelike deckbuilder inspired by Action RPGs.
It is intended for Steam page, which is why it goes straight into action.

The demo is free at https://svargasua.itch.io/forestygian , and is coming to Steam soon.
Wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3132780/Forestygian/

- Music: "Anguish" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
  - Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License
  - http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
- Fonts obtained from https://fonts.google.com/
- The trailer is made with DaVinci Resolve
